name = #{name},
id_number = #{idNumber},

`pay_count` = #{payCount},
where uid = #{uid}

mapper.select: select uid, phone, user_name, name, id_number, auth_status, usable_status, service_status, del_flag, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, battery_rent_status, battery_deposit_status,franchisee_id, car_rent_status, car_deposit_status, `car_battery_deposit_status`, `pay_count` from t_user_info where del_flag = 0 and id_number = #{idNumber} and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT 1 FROM t_user_info WHERE del_flag = 0 AND id_number = #{idNumber} AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} LIMIT 1
mapper.sql: select ui.uid,ui.user_name AS userName,ui.phone as phone, ubmc.sn AS batterySn, ubmc.card_pay_count AS payCount, ubmc.member_card_expire_time AS expireTime,uai.active_time AS activeTime
